Title: Do Not Send Us Astray
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Angela Kang, Matthew Negrete
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Danai Gurira
Plot: Trouble arises when unexpected visitors arrive at the Hilltop and the community is thrust into action; heartbreaking discoveries are made.
